com.att.research.xacml.std.dom

Class DOMAdvice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.dom.DOMAdvice

  • public class DOMAdvice
extends java.lang.Object
    DOMAdvice provides a static method for creating an instance of the com.att.research.xacml.Advice interface from a Node representing a XACML 3.0 Advice element, and for creating a List of Advice objects from a Node representing a XACML 3.0 AssociatedAdvice element.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Advice newInstance(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeAdvice)
      Creates a new Advice by parsing the given Node representing a XACML Advice element.
      static java.util.List<Advice> newList(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeAssociatedAdvice)
      Creates a List of Advice by parsing the given Node representing a XACML AssociatedAdvice element.
      static boolean repair(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeAdvice)
      Repairs the given Node representing a XACML Advice element if possible.
      static boolean repairList(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeAssociatedAdvice)

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static Advice newInstance(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeAdvice)
                          throws DOMStructureException
        Creates a new Advice by parsing the given Node representing a XACML Advice element.
        Parameters:
        nodeAdvice - the Node representing a XACML Advice element
        Returns:
        a new Advice parsed from the given Node.
        Throws:
        DOMStructureException - if there is an error parsing the Node

      • repair

        public static boolean repair(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeAdvice)
                      throws DOMStructureException
        Repairs the given Node representing a XACML Advice element if possible.
        Parameters:
        nodeAdvice - the Node to repair
        Returns:
        true if the node was altered, else false
        Throws:
        DOMStructureException - if an error occurred while repairing the Node

      • newList

        public static java.util.List<Advice> newList(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeAssociatedAdvice)
                                      throws DOMStructureException
        Creates a List of Advice by parsing the given Node representing a XACML AssociatedAdvice element.
        Parameters:
        nodeAssociatedAdvice - the Node representing the XACML AssociatedAdvice element
        Returns:
        a List of Advice parsed from the given Node
        Throws:
        DOMStructureException - if there is an error parsing the Node
